subject: Pedal problem
description_text:
Hello,
I have recently purchased your plus x pedals, they are reading 100% and working fine in your software and content manager but when I start up Assetto Corsa they read up to 80%, anyway you could help me 
Kind regards,
Dominik

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Dominik Lelas,    You can download the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 using the link below. Then, follow the steps below to update the firmware:    Go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-plusx.sfu to start the firmware update;    After the firmware update is completed, release the upgrade button;    Finally, test the pedal and perform a calibration.
